Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $18000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
